# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

The Government of Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) to support the delivery of the Privy Council Office (PCO) Risk-Based Audit Plan (RBAP).

## Request for Proposal Details

* **Reference Number:** 20222126
* **Solicitation Number:** 20222126A
* **Publication Date:** January 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
* **Contract Period:**Initial contract period of one year, with the option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods
* **Trade Agreements:** WTO-AGP, CFTA, CETA, CPTPP, CHFTA, CChileFTA, CKFTA, CUFTA, CUKBCA, CColFTA, CPanFTA, CPeruFTA
* **Regions of Operation:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

## Description of Work

The PCO requires Professional Audit Support Services to provide assurance and advisory engagements to support its internal audit function, supplementing project teams, and performing quality assurance reviews. The services are expected to be provided as and when requested by PCO, with a minimum corporate security requirement of SECRET.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated on the following criteria:

* Experience in providing professional audit support services
* Ability to meet the PCO's audit requirements
* Security clearance
* Financial responsibilities

## How to Respond

Interested suppliers should submit a proposal to the Contracting Authority, Adam Rouleau, at adam.rouleau@pco-bcp.gc.ca. The proposal should include all necessary documentation, including a detailed methodology for providing the services, a description of the respondent's team and qualifications, and a project timeline.

Please note that the request for proposal documents will be e-mailed directly to qualified suppliers who are being invited to bid on this requirement. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
